blurb: I'm an engineer and designer looking for a role at the intersection of the two disciplines. With an engineering education, and experience in UX design since 2013, I'm a perfect fit as a UX engineer or technical designer.

new-visions.summary: Design systems development, prototyping and feature design.
bullets: Managed the design system, Angular component library and documentation, and fostered closer cross-team collaboration between design & engineering.
Developed infrastructure for quickly prototyping and testing new features and interactions with simulated data.
Designed, prototyped, and tested numerous features for the data portal, and consulted on front-end implementation.

music-group.summary: Design process, high level product vision & business case development.
bullets: Identified customer needs, and defined business strategy and product specifications based on market and user research.
Developed a globally used tool to allow managers to quickly evaluate new projects based on ROI and other key data.

zynga.summary: Data analysis, UX research and testing for new features in Poker Web.
bullets: Optimized user flows based on the results of multi-variate testing, and configured final design parameters for a social engagement feature.
Performed secondary user research and A/B testing to define pricing for a new subscription-based revenue model.

noom.summary: Usability optimization, and user testing for the core food-logging feature.
bullets: Simplified the core food logging experience by modifying the information architecture to better fit the mental model observed during user interviews.
Prototyped interactions and user flows in Framer and Origami, and rigorously tested prototypes at varying levels of fidelity.

knowroaming.summary: User research, information architecture and UI design for mobile apps.
bullets: Overhauled the app interface and information architecture to better align with common use cases.

sony.summary: UI design and front-end development for a music discovery feature in MediaGo.
bullets: Led UI design and front-end development for a music discovery feature.
